prod_name: DIV+ Kim HW satin pull on trs
detail_desc: Ankle-length trousers in satin crêpe with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and elasticated hems.

Fitted, calf-length dress in stretch jersey with a stand-up collar and concealed zip at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with a gathered seam at the top, and pleats on one shoulder and at one side to create a draped effect at the front. Seam at the waist and a wrapover skirt with an asymmetric hem. Lined over the bust.

Long puff sleeves with a gathered seam at the top, and pleats on one shoulder and at one side to create a draped effect at the front. Seam at the waist and a wrapover skirt with an asymmetric hem. Lined over the bust.
Fully-fashioned trainers with details in imitation leather. Elasticated top edge, a loop front and back, and elasticated lacing with a drawstring at the top. Mesh insoles and patterned soles.

Short dress in a viscose crêpe weave containing glittery threads with a wide neckline and wide, elbow-length raglan sleeves. Wide, colourful smocking around the neckline and waist, and decorative ties at the waist with pompoms and tassels. Gathered seams around the sleeves and hem for added width. Lined.
